title: Bug 124067 - Relative path not supported when selecting XML file
description: Bug 124067 - When selecting an XML file, only the absolute path is supported. It should also support relative paths.
OB: When selecting the XML file, the relative path is not being used. The current behavior only supports absolute paths.
EB:
Description: When selecting an XML file, the application should support both relative and absolute paths.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a new report.
2. Select an XML file using a relative path.

Actual Result:
Only the absolute path is supported.

Expected Result:
Both the relative and absolute paths should be supported.
SR: Update the application to support relative paths when selecting an XML file and ensure that both relative and absolute paths are supported.
